response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This product is not just an item; it's a testament to innovation and quality that stands above the rest. Given its exceptional nature, I believe it would significantly enhance the value of your collection or business. For this unique opportunity, I am extending an exclusive offer to you at a price of $15,000. Should you choose to accept, you'll be investing in something truly special that promises to deliver unparalleled benefits. If you have any questions or need more information, please let me know. I look forward to the possibility of bringing this extraordinary product into your possession.", "product_price": 15000}
